General.Name: Finnair Oyj
General.Description: Finnair Oyj engages in the airline business in North America, Asia, and Europe. The company offers passenger and cargo traffic, ancillary services, package tours under the Aurinkomatkat-Suntours brand name, and other travel products; and support services comprising catering, aircraft maintenance, ground handling, and airline training. It operates through a fleet of 56 aircrafts, which included 25 wide-body and 31 narrowbody aircrafts. The company was incorporated in 1923 and is headquartered in Vantaa, Finland.
